story.label: Our Journey
story.title: Building the Future of Recruitment
story.p1: At SIAS, we are committed to transforming the hiring landscape through advanced artificial intelligence. Our mission is to provide organizations with an objective, efficient, and insightful interview assessment system.
story.p2: SIAS was developed as a capstone project by three dedicated students — Rama, Nyoman, and Gusmang — inspired by a shared passion for technology and human-centered solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: What distinguishes SIAS is our dedication to reliability, transparency, and user-focused innovation. We believe AI should empower people — not replace them — and our system is designed to enhance human decision-making while preserving the human element in recruitment.
